logos.description: Graphic depicting two stylized roses with multiple leaves and thorns, emerging from a cloud formation.
logos.color: White and light grey outlines, with subtle pink/lilac fill within the rose petals, grey leaves, and white/light grey cloud details.

logoFingerprint.notes: The embroidery on the center chest graphic shows fine detail and clear thread texture. The colors, especially the pink/lilac, are subtle and blend well with the white/light grey. The woven label on the cuff is a standard flag label type, sewn into the seam.
